page.title: 09Some Industries in Loanhead
page.content: Edgefield part of Loanhead houses many industries and a large work force mainly from Loanhead.These relativley mordern industries are varied in technique yet similar in aimes.A total of{95O}people work in{18}industries. They are:{Paterson,Coca Cola Ltd, {Palmers,Macdonalds,Harveys,Hardies,the {Granary,T.M.S,Western Coachworks, {Servis,A.W Lumsden,Alexanders of {Edinburgh,Selwood,Triton Electronics, {Whale,John Swan,Altrad Cotractors, {Veitch brothers,G Donaldson aslo {Mactaggart's Scott.}Mactaggart's have the most people working for them,a total of 5OO,while Palmers has a mere total of{5.} On one side of Edgefield Rd are 6 old cottages while opposite stand 14. Going along Edgefield Rd,a small area of land,lies empty because land deveopment has bought it.G. Barkess.
